document.full_text: a nato air strike destroyed 45 vehicles of muammar gaddafi's forces after they had killed at least five civilians in fighting in two east libyan towns, an oil official and a rebel spokesman said on sunday.
document.title: nato hits gaddafi convoy in east: oil official
lines_and_colors: a nato air strike destroyed 45 vehicles of muammar gaddafi's forces after they had killed at least five civilians in fighting in two east libyan towns, an oil official and a rebel spokesman said on sunday.
